cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM CMS_Role JOIN CMS_MembershipRole ON CMS_MembershipRole.RoleID = CMS_Role.RoleID JOIN CMS_MembershipUser ON CMS_MembershipUser.MembershipID = CMS_MembershipRole.MembershipID WHERE ##WHERE## AND @UserID = CMS_MembershipUser.UserID ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
